item.title: Boot Process
item.description:
Intention I want to inform the reader on a computer’s boot process

Narrative

  • How do we instruct qemu to load the kernel at 0x80000000?

  • linker.ld

  • entry.s

  • start.c

  • main.c

    • initializes the different services

Do you remember the last time you turned on your computer, ever wondered what happens behind the scenes? Well, if you have this article will make it clear and if you haven’t this article will give you something to think about.
